titles.title: A resolution to make appointments to the Committee on the Armed Services, the Committee on Commerce, Science and Transportation, the Committee on Energy, and Natural Resources, and the Special Committee on Aging.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 7/15/1993--Introduced. Appoints: (1) Senator Bryan to the Senate Committee on Armed Services; (2) Senator Mathews to the Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation; (3) Senator Dorgan to the Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources; and (4) Senator Riegle to the Special Committee on Aging.
